name: Gardening Gun
description:
This is an entry for Bevy Jam #3 - Side Effects. The side effect is that your magazine is a tree seed, and once you deplete it of bullets it gets planted.

Controls:

Keyboard (1)
Keyboard (2)
GamepadRunLeft/Right ArrowsA/DDpad/Left Stick
JumpZ
JSouth Face Button
ShootXKWest Face Button
PauseEscapeStart

Kill all the goblins in the level and go through the gate. If you mess up, restart the level from the pause menu.
